intro: Catabrosa minuta, commonly known as the dwarf catabrosa, is a small flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is adapted to arid environments and has succulent leaves that store water. It is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
